import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { AuthContext } from '../../context/AuthContext.jsx'; import { Card, Row, Col, Table } from "react-bootstrap"; const AdminDashboard = () => { const { logout } = useContext(AuthContext); return (

Dashboard

Total Containers
{containers.length}
Total Slots
{totalSlots}
Occupied
{occupied}
Pending Approvals
{pendingUsers.length}
Recent Activity
{history.length === 0 && }
Time Action Details
{new Date(h.ts).toLocaleString()} {h.action} {JSON.stringify(h, null, 0)}
No history yet
); }; export default AdminDashboard;
